panels.description: Shows if metrics are being received for the selected time range.

targets.expr: vector(1) and on() ((count(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"} == 1) > 0) and (absent(absent(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"})))) or vector(0) and on() ((count(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"}) > 0) and (absent(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"})))

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received for this device in the last 24 hours.

targets.expr: vector(1) and on() ((count(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"} == 1) > 0) and (absent(absent(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"})))) or vector(0) and on() ((count(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"}) > 0) and (absent(tailscale_device_online{device_name=~"$device"})))

title: Tailscale / Device Details
description: Detailed device monitoring dashboard for Tailscale networks using tsmetrics. Shows per-device metrics, connectivity analysis, and performance monitoring.
